programme.desc: In these uncertain times - food has shown to be one business that people have found a way to make a living. We want to give the opportunity to one winner who has the makings of a Food Truck Boss.

programme.title: Lensa Kenyalang Ep3
programme.desc: Lensa Kenyalang showcases evolving aesthetic of photography as seen throughthe lense of visual creator. Each Photographer will be assigned a task to photographheritage sites around Kuchingcity and will be sharing photography tips.

programme.title: Borneo From Above S2 Ep10
programme.desc: To promote and highlighting development of Sarawak

programme.title: In Search of The Food Preserves Ep1
programme.desc: With 6 ethnic groups of Sarawak represented, the host brings out the particularities of each and every one of them, sharing the cross-pollinating nature of our diverse culinary cultures.

programme.title: Dunia Insan Kreatif S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Magazine that will dive into entertainment and creative sector, sharing insider stories, industry players, authorities, and more. Get insights into business, future, and creative scene's current pulse.

programme.title: Time Traveller Luke Ep29
programme.desc: The show is about Luke and his friend, Jean that time-travel to many parts of the world to prevent Indiana, a thief that tried to steal and collect all the relics and treasures in the world.

programme.title: (L) Berita Iban TVS
programme.desc: Berita Iban memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Iban

programme.title: Agritek S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Agritek Musim kedua memaparkan kisah usahawan industri agrikultur yang berjaya dan melihat cara pertanian dari generasi tradisional hingga ke generasi moden.

programme.title: Dialog TVS Plus Ep10
programme.desc: Dialog TVS Plus membincangkan topik-topik menarik dengan lebih ringkas dan padat

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@12
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Rezeki Tanah Ep8
programme.desc: Infographics on major events of the day in Sarawak, Malaysia & globally

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Bario Vlog Ep6
programme.desc: Interesting video log exploring Bario's World.

programme.title: Sarawak Outdoor Adventures Ep1
programme.desc: Many has not really discovered the wonders of Sarawak. In each episode, the hosts will introduce the details for each location while travelling to location using the different mode of transportation.

programme.title: Ajaib Ep9
programme.desc: Dunia koma Jasmin dan mimpi Maliq mempertemukan mereka dalam satu dunia lain, yang akhirnya membuatkan mereka menjalinkan cinta. Pertemuan di dunia fantasi, akhirnya menyatukan mereka di dunia realiti

programme.title: Nang Nyaman! Ep11
programme.desc: Introducing recipes from the island of Borneo, with a modern twist which is easy to follow. Join Khaty, as she guides audiences to experience modern day borneo recipes with tweaks and tips.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie II
programme.desc: Inspektor Mazlan dan Inspektor Aleeza ditugaskan untuk menyiasat tentang satu sindiket penyeludapan dadah terbesar di Malaysia yang diketuai oleh seorang penjenayah yang bernama Raziman. Sindiket ini mempunyai berpuluh-puluh pengedar di seluruh negara dan dikaitkan dengan satu sindiket dadah antarabangsa.

programme.title: Labrak Mantan Auto Manten
programme.desc: Masayu Clara berasa hancur dan sangat kecewa apabila teman lelakinya tiba-tiba meninggalkannya untuk berkahwin dengannya. Dia terlalu beremosi sehingga menimbulkan kekecohan di majlis perkahwinan bekasnya, tetapi siapa sangka apabila dia terserempak dengan bekasnya, dia akhirnya bertemu dengan Fauzan Nasrul, yang pada mulanya menjengkelkan tetapi merinduinya.

programme.title: Tmo Syawal Yang Hilang
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Syawal Yang Hilang

programme.title: Syahadah Terakhir
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Pak Yusuf yang menyayangi anak-anaknya Razlan dan Rafidah bagai menatang minyak yang penuh sehingga mereka berjaya. Konflik bermula selepas kematian isterinya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3

programme.title: Bukan Orang Buta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuzik jalanan (busker) yang berbakat tetapi tidak diberi perhatian orang ramai telah menukar strateginya untuk menyamar sebagai seorang busker buta. Penyamarannya mula menarik perhatian ramai dan berjaya dilamar oleh sebuah syarikat muzik terkemuka. Walau bagaimanapun beliau perasan bahawa syarikat tersebut mempunyai agenda dan konspirasi jahat yang cuba dilakukan oleh seorang wanita yang juga pemilik syarikat muzik terkemuka tersebut. Jejaka tersebut bertekad dan mencuba menggagalkan kegiatan haram majikannya sambil terus berlakon sebagai seorang pemuzik buta.

programme.title: Bakal Suami Akan Datang
programme.desc: Seorang pereka grafik yang baru menamatkan pengajian sedang mencari pekerjaan dalam ekonomi yang teruk ini, apabila dia bertemu seorang mekanik dan jatuh cinta dengannya.

programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Mona yang pulang ke kampung membawa virus zombie kucing. Tanpa sedar! Virus itu telah menghuru-harakan Kampung Baru sehingga menyebabkan orang kampung bertukar menjadi zombie yang menyerupai kucing.

programme.title: Taubatku
programme.desc: Setelah lima tahun mendirikan rumah tangga, Ismail dan Maisarah akhirnya dikurniakan seorang anak. Kehidupan mereka semakin bahagia setelah kelahiran Yusuf namun hanya sementara apabila mereka terlibat dalam kemalangan dan Yusuf disahkan lumpuh seumur hidup. Tidak lama selepas itu, Maisarah pula terlibat dalam kemalangan dan meninggal dunia. Dunia Ismail terus berubah, dia harus bekerja keras untuk menjaga Yusuf sehinggakan kebajikan Yusuf mula terabai.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Gang Van Jenazah
programme.desc: Husin merupakan pemandu van jenazah bersahabat baik dengan Mail. Suatu hari Husin menerima panggilan untuk mengambil jenazah Pak Tam yang meninggal dunia akibat makan durian. Husin dan Mail dikehendaki menghantar jenazah Pak Tam ke kampung asalnya. Dalam perjalanan menghantar Pak Tam ke kampung asalnya, Mail menerima panggilan daripada kekasihnya, Sharifah yang ingin berjumpa kerana dipaksa bertunang dengan orang lain. Kerana kesuntukan masa Sharifah dibawa bersama, dan mereka menggunakan jalan pintas. Macam-macam hal dan kejadian berlaku.

programme.title: Tiada Tajuk
programme.desc: tiga orang pemuda kampung yang ingin menjadi penyanyi rock dan pop terkenal. Mereka berimpian besar tetapi tidak dihargai di kampung mereka. Pelbagai cabaran dan dugaan perlu mereka hadapi demi mencapai impian.

programme.title: Dollah Superstar

programme.title: Cinta Tak Semudah Dot Com
programme.desc: Seorang ejen hartanah lelaki muda yang miskin telah menyamar sebagai tuan punya sebuah banglo kepada seorang pelanggan wanita yang cantik dan diingati kaya tetapi mempunyai musilhat. Wanita tersebut yang merupakan seorang penjual kosmetik tiruan telah menyamar sebagai seorang wanita kaya dengan tujuan untuk mencari dan berkahwin dengan lelaki kaya.

programme.title: Kawan Aku Mati Dalam Rumah Sewa Dia
programme.desc: Kawan Aku Mati Dalam Rumah Sewa Dia mengisahkan tentang Acik yang bekerja sebagai penjahit kostum hantu yang sanggup membayar sewa kepada ayah tirinya sendiri iaitu Pak Brahim hanya kerana dia tidak ingin berkongsi rumah dengan adik-beradiknya. Suatu hari, Wan menelefon Achik untuk diajak pergi bercuti di Terengganu sempena menyambut kepulangan kawannya iaitu Akmal yang baru pulang dari luar negara. Achik menolak ajakan Wan sebaliknya mengajak rakannya itu untuk datang bercuti bersama di rumahnya.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Seorang jutawan telah mewasiatkan kepada peguamnya supaya mencari waris-warisnya yang berhak menerima harta bernilai lebih dari RM30 juta. Semua waris disyaratkan supaya berada di bangalo arwah di sebuah bukit peranginan selama 33 hari bagi melayakkan mereka mewarisi harta pusaka tersebut.

programme.title: Aku Yang Berhormat
programme.desc: dua sahabat sebagai petani menanam kopi tinggal dikampung yang sama. Mereka bersikap Bersih, Cekap dan Amanah telah dipilih menjadi seorang wakil rakyat yang berjaya.

programme.title: Gang Van Jenazah
programme.desc: Husin merupakan pemandu van jenazah bersahabat baik dengan Mail. Suatu hari Husin menerima panggilan untuk mengambil jenazah Pak Tam yang meninggal dunia akibat makan durian. programme.desc: Seorang pemuda berpelajaran tinggi lebih selesa hidup bebas dengan berperwatakan sebagai seorang 'rocker'. Pilihan dan cara hidupnya telah mengecewakan keluarganya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Cendera Kasih
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang ditinggalkan isterinya akibat perbuatan ibunya sendiri berjumpa semula dengan isterinya apabila ditugaskan menguruskan projek di kedah . Lelaki yang masih sayangkan isteri dan anaknya itu merayu supaya isterinya pulang ke pangkuannya

programme.title: Kasih Farrah
programme.desc: isu dendam oleh seorang lelaki dengan seorang wanita yang berlaku lebih 25 tahun dahulu, secara tidak sengaja lelaki itu pula bercinta dengan anak perempuan bekas kekasihnya sewaktu mereka berdua menuntut di luar negara.

programme.title: Neng OB Kalau Sudah Aktif Bikin Mlenyot
programme.desc: Gebi merupakan seorang pekerja dari salah satu hotel yang dimiliki oleh Rino. Pertemuan pertama Gebi dengan Rino adalah ketika dia dilanggar dalam kemalangan. Memandangkan Rino adalah seorang anak orang kaya, dia dengan sombongnya mengatakan akan membayar ganti rugi dua kali ganda. Akibat sikap sombong Rino, Gebi bersumpah untuk tidak mahu bertemu dengan Rino lagi.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep216
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep23
programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep37
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep201
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Siapa Takut Orang Ketiga Ep1
programme.desc: Kimi tiba di Swiss untuk memulakan hidup barunya dan di sana dia berkenalan dengan William, seorang pelajar Indonesia yang sedang menyelesaikan pengajiannya. William membantu Kimi mendapatkan pekerjaan. Samuel, sahabat Kimi di Indonesia, merasakan Kimi semakin dekat dengan William. Namun, Kimi menyangkal perkara itu. Hakikatnya, Kimi telah menyimpan perasaan kepada Samuel sejak lama.

programme.title: Aku Berjuang Mencintai Suami Yang Mencintai Wanita Lain
programme.desc: Hadi terpaksa menikahi Elda kerana telah dijodohkan oleh orang tuanya. Tetapi walaupun dia sudah berkahwin, Hadi sama sekali tidak mencintai Elda dan bahkan secara terbuka mencintai bekas kekasihnya, Safira. Elda yang tahu berusaha untuk bersabar dan masih menghormati status perkahwinannya.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep16
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep60
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: D'Academy Asia 6 Ep36
programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.title: Kata Ustadz Solmed Ep18
programme.desc: Kata Ustadz Solmed merupakan program bual bicara yang dibimbing oleh pengacara dan ustaz terkenal yang akan fokus membincangkan tentang masalah yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat sehinggalah masalah rumah tangga dari sudut agama.

programme.title: Aku Berjuang Mencintai Suami Yang Mencintai Wanita Lain
programme.desc: Hadi terpaksa menikahi Elda kerana telah dijodohkan oleh orang tuanya. Tetapi walaupun dia sudah berkahwin, Hadi sama sekali tidak mencintai Elda dan bahkan secara terbuka mencintai bekas kekasihnya, Safira. Elda yang tahu berusaha untuk bersabar dan masih menghormati status perkahwinannya.

programme.title: Siapa Takut Orang Ketiga Ep1
programme.desc: Kimi tiba di Swiss untuk memulakan hidup barunya dan di sana dia berkenalan dengan William, seorang pelajar Indonesia yang sedang menyelesaikan pengajiannya. William membantu Kimi mendapatkan pekerjaan. Samuel, sahabat Kimi di Indonesia, merasakan Kimi semakin dekat dengan William. Namun, Kimi menyangkal perkara itu. Hakikatnya, Kimi telah menyimpan perasaan kepada Samuel sejak lama.

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep24
programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep38
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep202
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Siapa Takut Orang Ketiga Ep2
programme.desc: Kimi tiba di Swiss untuk memulakan hidup barunya dan di sana dia berkenalan dengan William, seorang pelajar Indonesia yang sedang menyelesaikan pengajiannya. William membantu Kimi mendapatkan pekerjaan. Samuel, sahabat Kimi di Indonesia, merasakan Kimi semakin dekat dengan William. Namun, Kimi menyangkal perkara itu. Hakikatnya, Kimi telah menyimpan perasaan kepada Samuel sejak lama.

programme.title: Gulali Manis Bebas Toxic
programme.desc: Satria sangat marah apabila anak saudaranya diberikan gula-gula oleh Bella, si penjual gula-gula. Tapi kenapa Satria meminta Bella menjaga anak saudaranya? Adakah sebenarnya Satria benci atau hanya ingin mendekati Bella?

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep17
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Hot Kiss Ep1
programme.desc: Berita terhangat dan terkini mengenai artis-artis terkenal Indonesia yang disajikan secara ringkas dan menarik.

programme.title: D'Academy Asia 6 Ep37
programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.desc: Kedatangan Wati dan Supri ke Jakarta adalah kerana Wati ingin bertemu dengan kekasihnya, Bobby. Namun, tanpa diduga, ternyata Bobby hanya seorang pemandu kenderaan dan bukan seorang bos yang berjaya. Supri terus merasa kesal kerana usahanya bersama Wati seakan sia-sia.

programme.title: Juara Indonesia Ep14
programme.desc: Helo para guru dan murid-murid sekolah rendah di seluruh Indonesia! Uji pengetahuan dan ketangkasan dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat dalam Juara Indonesia.

programme.title: LIDA 2021 Ep24
programme.desc: LIDA 2021 ialah rancangan hiburan Dangdut terbesar dan no 1 di Indonesia. LIDA 2021 merupakan musim keempat Liga Dangdut Indonesia dan pemenang musim ini juga dijangka menjadi generasi dangdut Indonesia seterusnya.

programme.title: Three Sisters
programme.desc: Three sisters reunited for their father's birthday, yet the strange action of their brother reveals their dark past.

programme.title: Killing Romance
programme.desc: As a popular actress has growing discontentment towards her marriage, she begins planning to kill her rich husband with her neighbor.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each others backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: During the colonial rule of Japan, around 400 Koreans are conscripted into slave labor on Hashima Island. As the islands dark secrets are revealed, the Korean labourers plot to escape.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to save the day after a mad scientist releases a toxic gas that leaves thousands stranded in skyscrapers in Seoul district.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mother's surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as "Nobleman"...

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Oh! My Ghost
programme.desc: FD Taemin meets a female ghost who lives in the studio he works. As mysterious events happened in the studio, they join hands to investigate and protect his job and her sleeping place.

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Recalled
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss after an accident, Soo-jin begins to see eerie visions of murderous events. She grows suspicious of her husband after seeing a vision of him killing their neighbor

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting
programme.desc: During the extradition to Korea, a group of dangerous criminals united to stage an escape from the floating prison.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: My Little Bride
programme.desc: A high school girl was forced to marry a college student by her grandfather. The effort to keep the marriage secret was soon challenged as her husband will be teaching in her school as an intern

programme.title: Boys Be!
programme.desc: When two high school friends the best fighter in school and the other who hates physical conflict get involved in a fight involving local mobsters, they discover the true meaning of friendship.

programme.title: Iris: The Movie
programme.desc: Two rival special agents, both in love with a beautiful but lethal profiling specialist, are faced to confront each other in a nuclear terrorist attack.

programme.title: Herb
programme.desc: A 20-year-old woman with mild mental disorder falls in love with a policeman but must face heartbreak when she is forced to deal with certain realities about herself and those around her.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: A Year-End Medley
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Years Eve.

programme.desc: During the colonial rule of Japan, around 400 Koreans are conscripted into slave labor on Hashima Island. As the islands dark secrets are revealed, the Korean labourers plot to escape.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep475
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep3031
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep27
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep886887
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep699
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3400
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47574758
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep259260
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1868
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2121
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep973
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, The Eagle Shooting Heroes is loosely based on Louis Chas classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hungs action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: The New Legend of Shaolin
programme.desc: A Shaolin disciple Hong Xi Guan is tasked to escort the five young shaolin legends who have treasure maps tattooed on their backs to the base of the Anti-Qing Society. They are targeted and hunted by an assassin sent by the Qing government. Can Hong finally keep them safe and complete his mission?

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chefs delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Longs daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: The story is about a super standard girl in school, May Who, is on a quest to win the love of a school senior heart-throbber, Fame, with her new-found friend, Pong. The only secret is that she can discharge electricity when she gets excited

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy about a murdered cop returning from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie (Chow) into avenging his death.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: High Risk
programme.desc: After failing to save his wife, Kit resigned as a cop and becomes the bodyguard and stunt double for a cowardly action film star, Frankie. When attending a jewel exhibition, they run into a band of robbers. Kit identifies the murderer of his wife amongst them and chases after him. Will Frankie regain his courage to help Kit?

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Martial Arts Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: Swordsman And Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiaos home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wifes faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Longs wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past 10 years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lungs house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lungs mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the speed gang, led by Johnny, and Kuos sister Carrie is molested by Johnnys brother Michael. Kuos family continues to be harassed by the speed gang while on the island can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: The Voyage Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Heroes Of The East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Trail Of The Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Land Of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.desc: family drama starring sathyaraj,ramya krishnan

programme.title: Unrelated
programme.desc: Starring Tom Hiddleston (Thor) and newcomer Kathryn Worth, Unrelated is a terse and gripping psychodrama that focuses on a childless Anna whos dissatisfied with her marriage. She soon falls for another man but her demons soon return to haunt her.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Silent Night
programme.desc: The owner of the historic Sylt company Betten-Reuter, is found dead and two infamous Santa Clauses are believed to have silenced him. Known for robbery, is the notorious pair really also capable of murder?

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: H Is For Happiness
programme.desc: In this quirky coming-of-age dramedy, Candice is a twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and happiness. Set in the quirky town of Albany, she sets out to conquer the trials of adolescence and bring love back into her broken family.

programme.title: The Happiest Girl In The World
programme.desc: Delia, an 18-year-old girl from a small Romanian town learns that she has won a car in a contest, and she travels to Bucharest with her parents to claim it. All goes well, until Delia and her family starts to disagree on what to do with the car.

programme.title: The Grump
programme.desc: After a bad fall, a grumpy old farmer is forced to move to the city to live with his meek son and domineering daughter-in-law. He ends up squabbling with her and the house becomes a chaotic hellhole. Yet, with time, the family becomes closer than ever.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Deadly Turquoise
programme.desc: When the corpse of a famous art expert was discovered in the dunes, Sievers and Ina are tasked to pursue any possible leads. However, findings of turquoise-coloured particles on the corpse point to the investigation of a long-lost painting

programme.title: Watchtower
programme.desc: Haunted by a tragedy, Nihat has isolated himself as a warden of a remote watchtower. He meets Seher, a hostess, and finds himself compelled to strike a companionship with her. Through their partnership, they find solace and hope in one another.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.

programme.title: A Summer in Barcelona
programme.desc: Lisa Hellman falls in love with Catalan bank heir Emilio, but soon realises that both their families are fundamentally incompatible. His familys wealth and conservatism make Lisa rethink marriage, and she starts to develop feelings for Emilios cousin, Pablo.

programme.title: Strawberry Days
programme.desc: A young Polish farmworker falls in love with the farm owners Swedish daughter. Hes poor and exploited while shes privileged and rich. Their tender love threatens to be foiled when a violent confrontation erupts between their respective communities.

programme.title: The Soul Of The Tigre
programme.desc: Alex, a young Franco-Chinese man, learns of his brothers mysterious death, and returns to his family in the Chinese district of Paris. With the help of his cousin Lily, he investigates his brothers death and uncovers a family secret.

programme.title: Zagros
programme.desc: In Kurdistan, Zagross happy marriage falters when relatives start questioning his wifes growing modern personality. She soon runs away to Brussels for refuge. He follows her out of love but the burden of tradition and patriarchy never leaves him.

programme.title: Spin
programme.desc: SPIN seeks to explore circumstance versus choice, breaking points, and second chances through the lives of two men in the city and their incidental yet preordained meeting in a one-way alley that would change their lives thereafter.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: Bella Swan, a troubled teenager, falls for a mysterious loner with a shocking secret. Does he have anything to do with the local murders that have started taking place?

programme.title: Friends S8 18
programme.desc: Monica becomes inarticulate while giving her toast at a anniversary party for her parents.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 6
programme.desc: Let the revelry begin as 20 of the most boneheaded partiers throw down. From twerking babes to an overzealous Willie Nelson fan and a drunken keg stand you can't un-see. Plus awesome commentary from our cast of comics, including Brendon Walsh, KevinMcCaffrey and Jaime Andrews

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 06
programme.desc: At an antique store, Michael shows off an impossible way to organize your clothes, and back at the supermarket we find out that there are some serious surprises lurking in our favorite foods. Finally, at the Navy Yard, Michael pushes his skills to the limit when he attempts one of his most ambitious feats yet - tricking two people at the same time!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 2
programme.desc: Q, Sal, Murr and Joe use a two-way mirror to get each other to crack and then hit a grocery to see who can sell the most samples. Plus, the loser gets taken for a ride that ends with a visit to the Statue of Liberty.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 19
programme.desc: George and Mary insist on meeting the new woman in Georgies life, while Sheldon and Missy have suspicions about whats going on with their family.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 20
programme.desc: Despite the whole family trying to keep it a secret, Sheldon and Missy learn about Georgies pregnancy.

programme.title: Gotham S1 18
programme.desc: After the attack, Bruce deals with the aftermath. Meanwhile, Fishs allegiance with the prisoners is questioned when she appears to join forces with Dr. Dulmacher (Colm Feore).

programme.title: Arrow S1 3
programme.desc: When someone shoots and kills one of his targets, Oliver searches for the gunman, Deadshot, whos taking out businessmen and Walter is one of his targets.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 13
programme.desc: Cash is falling from the sky as our buyers go head to head at the biggest airport auction ever seen. Jesse gambles hard on a mystery box with a telling message. Then, Scott and Chrissy battle it out over a jet-fueled jewel. And later, the crowd is driven to a frenzy when Sean reveals a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity that's gonna make one deep-pocketed bidder's dreams come true.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 1
programme.desc: Old rivals come out smokin' in an attempt to uncover some unique finds. When Jesse tries to bump off Brandon and Lori, will he score high or strike out? With the other hunters battling, Scott and Chrissy ride in and sweep up some bargains before thedust settles.

programme.desc: Leonard and Howard enlist Barry Kripke (JOHN ROSS BOWIE) to help after they learn Sheldon betrayed them by working with the military behind their backs.

programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin explore hacks for getting special treatment at a restaurant, and Broke Ass Bob finds hacks to save you money. Plus, become your very own sushi chef.

programme.title: Going In Style (2017)
programme.desc: Oscar winners Morgan Freeman, Michael Caine and Alan Arkin team up as lifelong buddies Willie, Joe and Al, who decide to buck retirement and step off the straight-and-narrow for the first time in their lives when their pension fund becomes a corporate casualty, in director Zach Braff's comedy Going In Style. Desperate to pay the bills and come through for their loved ones, the three risk it all by embarking on a daring bid to knock off the very bank that absconded with their money.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 07
programme.desc: Michael and his fellow employees debate the authenticity of a giant lizard and find a game with a very specific target audience. Then at the diner, he adds some spice to lunch time and gives patrons the chills while demonstrating a new way to cool soup. Finally at the furniture store, Michael shows his coworker that impossible things can happen in the blink of an eye.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 3
programme.desc: Sal, Joe, Murr and Q get stuck in a grocery showdown, beg strangers for questionable quotes, and spew financial tips that are anything but sound. Plus, the loser earns a time-out for his outrageous antics at a kid's play space.

programme.title: We'Re The Millers
programme.desc: Jason Sudeikis stars in this buzz-worthy comedy as a small-time suburban pot-dealer who likes to keep a low profile. When he's jumped by some gutter punks who steal his cash and his stash, he finds himself in deep trouble with his supplier, Brad (Ed Helms). In order to make amends, the small-time peddler must become a big-time drug smuggler by bringing Brad's latest shipment in from Mexico. Enlisting his neighbors a cynical stripper (Jennifer Aniston), a streetwise teen (Emma Roberts) and a wannabe customer (Will Poulter) he comes up with a foolproof plan. One fake wife, two pretend kids and a ginormous shiny RV later, "the Millers" are headed south of the border for a Fourth of July weekend that's sure to end with a bang or two!

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: "Hereafter" tells the story of three people who are touched by death in different ways. George (Matt Damon) is a blue-collar American with a special connection to the afterlife dating from his childhood. On the other side of the world, Marie (Ccile De France), a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when London schoolboy Marcus (Frankie and George McLaren) loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. Each seeking the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter. Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood directs this haunting original tale from a screenplay by two-time Oscar nominee Peter Morgan.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: There's more than one way to lose your life to a killer. The hunt is on for a serial killer in San Francisco. Few cases in the history of true crime are as intriguing as that of Zodiac, a bizarre gunman in an executioner's hood, who taunts the police with dozens of letters containing eerie messages and cryptograms. Director David Fincher (Panic Room, Fight Club, Se7en) captures the story of the infamous killer who terrorized the city in the late 1960s. Jake Gyllenhaal (Jarhead, The Day After Tomorrow), Robert Downey, Jr. (Kiss Kiss, Bang Bang), Anthony Edwards ("ER") and Mark Ruffalo (We Don't Live Here Anymore, Rumor Has It...) star.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Kangaroo - Hondo (Shemar Moore) leads S.W.A.T. in a race against the clock to stop terrorists from executing a trio of city officials. Street (Alex Russell) faces a difficult choice after finding his mom strung out on drugs.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior Junior S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Qualifier 1 - American Ninja Warrior Junior is back and more extra than ever. This season, the series is taking the nation's top junior athletes and putting them on the world's most iconic course to compete on some of the most challenging obstacles yet. They'll put their mental and physical strength to the test as they go head-to-head in extra competitive, extra inspiring and extra fun races. programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles S13 Ep2
programme.desc: Fukushu - NCIS takes the case personally when an LAPD officer's father, a beloved elderly Japanese American veteran, is the victim of a vicious hate crime.

programme.title: FBI: International S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Secrets She Knows - After a U.S. intelligence negotiator goes missing and her ransacked Paris apartment is discovered to be covered in her blood, the team is on the clock to find her before the country's nuclear secrets fall into the wrong hands.

programme.title: When The Flowers Bloom
programme.desc: "When The Flowers Bloom" records the landscape environment around Guo Huoyan's family and his life, and outlines the humanistic context and beauty of the mountains, forests and settlements of the guest house.

programme.title: The Rookie S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Life And Death - Officer Nolan and the entire team race against the clock to locate Lopez after she is kidnapped on her wedding day, not only to save her life but her unborn child's, on the season four premiere of "The Rookie,"

programme.title: CSI: Miami S10 Ep18
programme.desc: Law & Disorder - Horatio uncovers a corruption scandal that pits him against an old adversary, and Calleigh makes a life-changing decision. Malcolm McDowell returns as ruthless attorney Darren Vogel.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Appeal - When three prosecutors are assassinated outside a bar in their small Arkansas town, the team is called in to determine if this was connected to a case from the local DA's office or if it's a personal vendetta.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles S13 Ep3
programme.desc: Indentured - Sam and Kilbride clash when a case involving an arms dealer responsible for the slaughter of ATF agents leads them to a well-connected colonel and friend of Kilbride, accused of supplying militia groups with guns.

programme.title: FBI: International S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Trying To Grab Smoke - When an American founder of an illegal adults-only site is killed in Prague, the team is tasked to locate his co-founder, who is still on the run in the Czech Republic. Also, Kellett struggles to maintain a relationship with her mother.

programme.title: Fantasy Island S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Mj Akuda & The 1st, 2nd, And 3rd Wives Club - Sue, Jenna and Brooklyn are the first, second and third wives of Gavin, a charming doctor who broke all of their hearts; Roarke brings Ruby's youngest daughter, MJ, to the island to help Ruby remember who she is.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawai'i S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Changing Tides - When a Marine Corporal dies in a tide pool after being exposed to fentanyl, the NCIS team must quickly find the source of the drugs. Also, Alex talks to his parents about taking a gap year and Ernie reveals personal news to Lucy.

programme.title: The Rookie S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Five Minutes - Officer Nolan and Officer Chen's run-in with an infamous thief tips them off to a potentially big heist surrounding the Getty's big gala event. Meanwhile, Nolan works up the courage to ask Bailey out on date.

programme.title: Fantasy Island S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Mj Akuda & The 1st, 2nd, And 3rd Wives Club - Sue, Jenna and Brooklyn are the first, second and third wives of Gavin, a charming doctor who broke all of their hearts; Roarke brings Ruby's youngest daughter, MJ, to the island to help Ruby remember who she is.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Processed - When a celebrity child psychiatrist specializing in generational trauma is kidnapped by the relative of a former client, the team races to track down the perpetrator and learns what really happened to the psychiatrist's client.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles S13 Ep4
programme.desc: Sorry For Your Loss - As Callen continues hunting Katya, Kilbride enlists NCIS to help find a truckload of stolen guns. The assignment becomes more challenging when their suspect, the son of a mob boss they believe was planning to sell them, is found dead.

programme.title: FBI: International S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Voice Of The People - When a group of Americans are among the victims of a bombing at a festival in Budapest, the team is brought in to find the perpetrators before they strike again.

programme.title: CSI: Vegas S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Boned - The CSI team investigates the death of an archaeologist found near the breakthrough discovery of an ancient civilization. Also, Max locates another cryptic note written in familiar silver ink after a mentally distressed woman kills her attacker.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawai'i S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Vanishing Act - When Cam comes to NCIS after his mom, Allie, goes missing, we learn a bounty hunter is searching for her after she embezzled millions from her former employer ten years prior. After communicating with her via Minecraft, they arrange a meeting where she's kidnapped; but it isn't the bounty hunter. Instead, he leads her kidnappers right to her. It turns out she didn't embezzle anything. The real embezzlers are after her with the assumption that she has information on their dealings.

programme.title: The Rookie S4 Ep3
programme.desc: In The Line Of Fire - Officer Nolan and officer Chen report to a structure fire and suspect that there is more to the situation than meets the eye. Meanwhile, after witnessing a sniper shooting, the team searches for the shooter and discovers that the perpetrator has a connection to one of their own.

programme.title: CSI: Vegas S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Boned - The CSI team investigates the death of an archaeologist found near the breakthrough discovery of an ancient civilization. Also, Max locates another cryptic note written in familiar silver ink after a mentally distressed woman kills her attacker.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S4 Ep10
programme.desc: False Flag - The team is thrown for a loop when they discover that the abductor of a disgraced state police detective is connected to someone from a recent case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles S13 Ep5
programme.desc: Divided We Fall - When an NCIS mission to protect a compromised undercover agent goes completely sideways, the agents are individually interrogated to find out what really happened. Also, Kilbride must make a difficult decision.

programme.title: FBI: International S1 Ep9
programme.desc: One Kind Of Madman - The team jets to Bulgaria when terrorists hold hostage for millions in cryptocurrency a concert hall filled with multinational student performers and their families.

programme.title: CSI: Vegas S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Third Time's The Charm - The CSIs investigate the mysterious death of a competitive eating contestant, and Chavez partners with Allie to prove where the mysterious silver ink notes have been coming from.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawai'i S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Curtain Call - When a naval officer is murdered while moonlighting in community theater, the NCIS team recruits a familiar face to help lead them to a ruthless international killer. Also, Kai enlists Whistler to open an investigation into an old friend turned criminal.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep22
programme.desc: Screwed - Fin's nephew, Darius, goes to trial and seems determined to take the unit down with him.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Divided He Falls - Samantha wants to go to Miami, but Darrin is too busy with work. Endora then splits Darrin in two.

programme.title: Quantum Leap S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Another Mother - Sam comes to the aid of a divorced mother whose socially awkward teen-age son may make a tragic mistake if he succumbs to peer pressure.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S5 Ep09
programme.desc: He Married An Angel - The Angels are hired by Barbara Stone to track down John Thornwood. He has swindled them out of $100,000 by promising to marry Jane and persuading her to invest money in a phony oil exploration venture.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Mother Jefferson's Birthday - Mother Jefferson visits George, Louise, and Lionel on her birthday, expecting them to throw her a surprise party. After they realize that they've forgotten about her big day, they scramble to put together something.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Louise's Cookbook - To George's disgruntlement, Louise is offered to write a cookbook.

programme.title: The Bionic Woman S1 Ep01
programme.desc: Welcome Home Jamie Part I - Jaime Sommers, the first bionic woman, has her memory partly restored, but she can't remember having been engaged to Steve Austin.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Man's Best Friend - Rodney is a young warlock in love with Samantha. Samantha tells him to leave as she is happily married. Rodney decides to leave only if he feels Darrin worthy.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep05
programme.desc: Old Man Out - Part 2 - The perfectly planned escape is shattered when Cardinal Vossek is moved to solitary confinement. The team is tested with the ultimate impossible rescue task.

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep17
programme.desc: The Mail Goes To Jail - Suffering from a bad cold, Cliff takes time off his mail route to warm up inside Cheers, where Norm generously offers to finish his deliveries on his way home.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Four And Twenty Blackbirds - The death of an eminent painter arouses Poirot's suspicions especially when he learns that there are a number of curious events connected with the case and someone stands to inherit a fortune.

programme.title: The Nanny S1 Ep07
programme.desc: The Butler, The Husband,The Wife And Her Mother - With Maxwell and the kids at a museum celebrating Brighton's election to class president, Fran prepares for lunch with her mother and a pair of relatives from Florida.

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Bar Bet - An old bet forces Sam to choose between getting married or losing Cheers.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Odds on Evil - A shipment of arms that could bring war to the Near East sends the IMF into action at a plush gambling casino on the shores of the Aegean in "Odds On Evil"

programme.title: Quantum Leap S2 Ep14
programme.desc: All-Americans - Sam leaps into the life of a 1962 teen-age football star who desperately tries to prevent a teammate from throwing the big game.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In this episode, on-board cameras transform our understanding of meerkats, chimps and penguins.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep8
programme.desc: After the discovery of oil in the 1930s, the seas around Bahrain became damaged through increased shipping and spillages, and sea life was decimated. A huge engineering project was required to protect the environment and keep the trade flowing.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep7
programme.desc: In this episode, tortilla chips are produced by the thousand, bite-size coffee cakes are created, and vegan mint double chocolate cookies are made. Plus, a look at microwaveable popcorn.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep8
programme.desc: This episode looks at the production of Triple "C" cheesecake, animal crackers, crispy sweet potato fries, and the tofu that gets a gourmet overhaul.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Galapagos - Martin explores the legendary Galapagos, getting up close to sealions, iguanas, tortoises, penguins, finches and baby sharks. He joins conservation expeditions, sees evolution in action, visits a nun, an organic farm and the site of a murder mystery.

programme.title: Planet Earth III S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Extremes - David Attenborough reveals the extraordinary ways in which animals battle to survive the elements in a world of extremes. From mountain summits to scorching deserts, polar tundra to deep underground caves, these remote places are rarely visited, yet the animals that survive there are some of the most resilient and specially adapted on Earth.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep9
programme.desc: In this episode we get to peek at the production of Hershey's Kisses, a fusion of the French crepe and the Russian blini, the gummy candies that look just like rainforest frogs, and the extraction of Madagascan vanilla extract.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep10
programme.desc: This episode looks at the production of tutti-frutti candies, spinach potato latkes, gluten-free shirataki noodles, and how to make guilt-free crisps with pinto beans and vegetables.

programme.title: Animal Einsteins S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Builders - Chris reveals some of the best building animals in the world - an incredibly varied group.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Spice Trail Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: India - Joanna returns to her birthplace, India, in search of a kitchen cupboard staple once known as 'black gold'. Starting in the majestic ancient city of Hampi, she's invited to a dazzling Hindu festival by a local rock climber.

programme.title: Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Snowball - Life's existence hangs in the balance when ancient Earth almost entirely freezes over.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S9 Ep5
programme.desc: Creature of The Night - In the midst of dark winter, Arctic residents must brace for the dangers that lurk in the constant darkness.

programme.desc: Simon joins an Aussie rancher to round up camels using a specially-adapted off road vehicle and a chopper.
